name: Plumbing
description: All your Plumbing and Sanitary-related problems I will be taken care of. I am experts in fitting, installations, and drainage related issues. I will Study and analyze blueprints and floor plans to understand the plumbing system and water supply system layout.Will Navigate the assembly and installation of pipes and tubes without interfering with existing infrastructure,Measure, cut and bend pipe materials to the correct size and shape.
pricing: Only Service Charge
Visiting Charges is BDT 100 if no service is availed
Excludes all components and parts (if used)
Excludes Transportation cost (if applied)
